Ref https://github.com/apache/shardingsphere/issues/6480.

- Add `DROP OPERATOR` grammar
- Support parsing  `DROP OPERATOR` in oracle
- Add test

repo.name: shardingsphere
repo.description: Ecosystem to transform any database into a distributed database system, and enhance it with sharding, elastic scaling, encryption features & more

title: Support parsing `ALTER OPERATOR` in PostgreSQL
body:
Ref #17848 .
Sub-issue of  #14015

Changes proposed in this pull request:
- Proofread `ALTER OPERATOR` grammar
- Support parsing `ALTER OPERATOR` in PostgreSQL
- Add tests

✅ Builds locally
🥳 GSoC Task 1
